elements.brief: decode JSON from a string to a lua-table
elements.description:
Decode a string of JSON data into a Lua table.
A Lua error is raised for syntax errors.
elements.name: json.decode

parameters.doc:
table with decode options
  • string decode_null_as_userdata: wether to decode a JSON null value as json.null or nil (default is nil)
parameters.name: options

elements.brief: encode a lua table to a JSON string
elements.description:
Encode a lua table to a JSON string.
A Lua error is raised for syntax errors.
elements.examples:
Convert a lua table to a JSON string: 
function init(self)
     local tbl = {
          persons = {
               { name = "John Doe"},
               { name = "Darth Vader"}
          }
     }
     local jsonstring = json.encode(tbl)
     pprint(jsonstring)
end
Results in the following printout: 
{"persons":[{"name":"John Doe"},{"name":"Darth Vader"}]}
elements.name: json.encode

parameters.doc:
table with encode options
  • string encode_empty_table_as_object: wether to encode an empty table as an JSON object or array (default is object)
parameters.name: options

elements.description: Represents the null primitive from a json file
elements.name: json.null
